description:
A second-year student in the mechanical department, who belongs to http://anidb.net/ch125792 [Jeturk House]. Petra is a cool and intellectual honor-student type. Like http://anidb.net/ch126130 [Felsi], she admires http://anidb.net/ch124442 [Guel].
Source: Official page
name: Petra Itta
